clinical_study.brief_title: Therapeutic Efficacy of "Abroma Agusta" in HbA1c % in NIDDM
clinical_study.official_title: Therapeutic Efficacy of Homoeopathic Mother Tincture of "Abroma Agusta" in Changing the Level of Glycated Hb (HbA1c %) in Diabetes Mellitus Type II (NIDDM

oversight_info.authority: India: Indian Council of Medical Research

brief_summary.textblock:
Objective: To ascertain whether homoeopathic medicine ABROMA AUGUSTA has a clinical role in changing the Glycated Hb Level in Diabetes mellitus Type II.
Introduction:
Diabetes mellitus is classed as a metabolism disorder. It is often simply referred to as diabetes—is a group of metabolic diseases in which a person has high blood sugar, either because the body does not produce enough insulin, or because cells do not respond to the insulin that is produced.
Blood sugar level is not only the criteria to diagnose the Dabeties Mellitus , Glycated hemoglobin (glycosylated hemoglobin, hemoglobin A1c, HbA1c, A1C, or Hb1; sometimes also HbA1c) is a form of hemoglobin used primarily to identify the average plasma glucose concentration over prolonged periods of time.
Diabetes is the single most important metabolic disease which can affect nearly every organ system in the body. According to the World Health Organization estimates, India had 32 million diabetic subjects in the year 2000 and this number would increase to 80 million by the year 2030 (1). The 2010 American Diabetes Association Standards of Medical Care in Diabetes added the A1c ≥ 6.5% as another criterion for the diagnosis of diabetes.It is noticed that the blood sugar(HbA1c) is not controlled by other system of medicine, the patients come for Homoeopathic treatment and afc.ter homoeopathic treatment, it is seen that there is a remarkable improvements on HbA1c along with the general improvement of health like tiredness, lethargy numbness, polyurea, polydypsia and polyphagia et. But there is no scientific validation for that. So this study is conducted for achieving the optimal ugglycosuria, homoeopathic hypoglycemics is investigated.

In brief, it has its action on all the systems of human body, which are similar to Camphor, Acid-phos, Uranium nitricum, Syzygium and Lactic acid but it is an excellent remedy for amenorrhoea, dysmenorrhoea and diabetes. It is indicated in irregular catamenia where there is tendency to appear before proper time and lasts for a short or for a long period.
Several cases of Diabetes Mellitus even with complications - diabetic foot treated with homoeopathic medicines and seen very good results clinically.
Potency used - mother tincure, 6c, 12c, 30 etc in frequent interval.
Materials and methods:
Research plan:
Sampling Details: Patients attending the OPD of Fr Muller Homoeopathic Medical College Hospital, St Antonyn's Hospital, Prasanth Nivas Hospital, and NMPT's Mobile centre will be taken up for study. This study will be done on 30 diagnosed cases with high HbA1c level. But approximately 40-50 patients will be screened to ensure enrollment of 30 patients in trial.
Inclusion Criteria Exclusion Criteria Age 30 Years above Patient with major complications like diabetic retinopathy and cardiomyopathy.
Both Sexes NIDDM IDDM FBS - 110-300mg/dl HbA1c above ≤ 6.5 HbA1c above 11%
Research protocol:
Sampling: purposive sampling will be followed in this study. Patients who belong to the above category of inclusions criteria will be taken up and those will be willing to take homoeopathic medicines for T2DM.
Screening: the patients having the Random Blood Suger (RBS) - 150mg/dl above will be sending for the following tests listed below:
Fasting (FBS) - above 111mg/dl Post Prandial blood Suger (PPBS) -150mg/dl above. HbA1c% - above 6.5 Those will fulfill the above criteria, will be included in this study. Cases will be recorded in a prescribed format which is given in Anexure 4 along with patients consent form and patient's information sheet.
Medicines: Abroma Augusta Q (Mother tincture form) Dose: 30 drops TDS Visits: Follow up - every 15 days FBS & PPBS - Monthly HbA1c% - end of 3 months Each patient will be treated minimum 3 months with Abroma Augusta Ɵ and FBS, and PPBS will be checked in every month and HbA1c once in 3 months as the life span of RBC is 120 days.
.Research Methodology & statistics:
Criteria for deciding the efficacy of Homoeopathic drugs will be based on parameters follow:
1. . Change FBS, and PPBS
2. Change in HbA1c level
Statistical analysis:
Data from the sample will be collected and it will be analysed based on Paired't' test to determine the efficacy of homoeopathic medicines.
Null Hypothesis: No Significant variation in HbA1c before and after treatment. Alternate Hypothesis: Significant Variation in HbA1c before and after treatment.
Tabulation will be done based on SPS package.
